= Introduction =
https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-EM2lSOETwbo/T1Mmvrp5uLI/AAAAAAAAADw/qqz00z4FIV8/s993/trace.png

SkyQuant is a powerful solution for investigation in financial astrology. The plug-in is based on AmiBroker platform which allows to process a huge mass of historical and real-time data.



== Major features: ==
 * New kind of visualization
 * Own algorithms Backtesting and Optimization
 * Fast calculation environment
 * It's *FREE* and it's *Open Source*
